name: Friendly Fire (itch) (XionSol, X36Granitplate, MonkeeDan, Deathadden, xKayo, Citron)
name_original: Friendly Fire (itch) (XionSol, X36Granitplate, MonkeeDan, Deathadden, xKayo, Citron)
description:
Visit your friends in the forest, on the meadow and the thicket!
But be careful not to leave any of them behind, as you burn your way through the levels, greeting, hugging and most importantly: inflaming!


"Friendly Fire" is designed for the Windows PC and can be controlled with keyboard and controller.

This game was created as part of the htk Game Jam |  2022 Ice Edition with the theme "YOU ARE THE ENEMY".

Installation Guide:

  1.  Download the ZIP file.
  2.  Right click and select "Extract All...".
  3.  Save the files in a safe and dry place.
  4.  Start the .exe.
  5.  Have fun playing!
